title: Joins: ON vs USING
sql:
select * from hr.countries c
join   hr.regions r
using  ( region_id )
fetch  first 2 rows only;

 REGION_ID CO COUNTRY_NAME    REGION_NAME              
         1 BE Belgium         Europe                   
         1 CH Switzerland     Europe             

select * from hr.countries c
join   hr.regions r
on     r.region_id = c.region_id
fetch  first 2 rows only;

CO COUNTRY_NAME     REGION_ID  REGION_ID REGION_NAME              
BE Belgium                  1          1 Europe                   
CH Switzerland              1          1 Europe
